programme.title: Magical Mcway Cove
programme.desc: The sights and sounds of Big Sur.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways
programme.desc: Footage of the rocky coast of Shimizu Island in the Philippines.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways
programme.desc: Indulging in warm breezes, soft white sand and dazzling sapphire waters on the Dominican Republic's Playa Las Galeras.

programme.title: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: A tropical island paradise to relax in. A one hour long high definition nature experience of two different remote islands hidden in the south Pacific.

programme.title: Northland Beaches: New Zealand
programme.desc: Traversing the Northland region's pristine beaches that showcase the diverse natural beauty of New Zealand's coastline, and basking in the unspoiled scenery of sandy shores, clear waters, and stunning natural landscapes.

programme.title: Purple Mountain Wildflowers
programme.desc: An hour-long immersion into a field of purple lupine flowers in full bloom on a perfect sunny day with bits of clouds and rain appearing along with nature sounds.

programme.title: Diamond Beach II: Indonesia
programme.desc: These shores and accompanying diamond-shaped cliffs are often compared to the idyllic beach scenes of postcards.

programme.title: Far North Beaches: New Zealand
programme.desc: The tranquil beaches of New Zealand's Far North, complete with small coves.

programme.title: Beyond Infinity 1
programme.desc: Soaring away to different galaxies rich in colors and computer-generated space visuals; paired with spacious ambient instrumental music created for immersive relaxation; featuring visuals and music by Dutch artist Nimanty.

programme.title: Hemin Pealey: Îles de la Madeleine
programme.sub-title: Hemin Pealey: Îles de la Madeleine
programme.desc: Rocky cliffs that overlook calm waters.

programme.title: Rainbow Reef Relaxation 2
programme.desc: Vibrant underwater reefs, including many scenes which no longer look as depicted due to coral bleaching.

programme.title: Golden Hour in Paradise
programme.desc: A 4K UHD video collage with soft instrumental music from one moment in paradise to the next, with ambient nature sounds and soft music for deep relaxation.

programme.title: Healing Hawaii II: Oahu
programme.desc: The wonders of the Hawaiian Island of Oahu.

programme.title: Hollyford Track: New Zealand
programme.desc: A remote beech forest full of diverse vegetation, waterfalls and rocky streams.

programme.title: Shark Paradise
programme.desc: Captured by filmmaker collaborator Peter Schneider, Shark Paradise features hundreds of unique real-time scenes captured from around the world, paired with gentle underwater sounds and calming music for deep relaxation by Relax Moods.

programme.title: Cadlao Lagoon: Philippines
programme.desc: Experiencing the beauty of a turquoise lagoon flanked by impressive, vegetation-covered, mountains.

programme.title: Natural Beauty
programme.desc: Footage of Douro Valley, one of Portugal's most scenic wine regions.

programme.title: Inspiring Sights
programme.desc: Visit the medieval town of Menton on the French Cote d'Azur, where the sun glistens on the iridescent water.

programme.title: Pure Relaxation
programme.desc: Relaxing to the slow descent of the sun over calm waters.

programme.title: Above & Below the Caribbean
programme.desc: A static scene of Curacao, Caribbean; featuring swimming fish, passing clouds, and sunshine glistening; filmed by Tilo and Yvonne Kühnast.

programme.title: Above the Dolomites
programme.desc: Featuring cinematography by new collaborator Ryan Shirley and synchronized to new healing music by Antonio Resende; offering some views that showcase the Dolomites mountain range.

programme.title: Return to Paradise 1
programme.desc: Featuring the hidden exotic Fijian island of Nanuku, a tiny, palm-covered, sandy atoll surrounded by lagoons brimming with sea life; some aerial drone clips give perspective from above.

programme.title: Tiga Warna Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Exploring the many faces of a breathtaking beach in Indonesia.

programme.title: The Soothing Sun
programme.desc: Rejoice and relax in the splendor of the glorious Sun for a full hour, with this new video by David Huting.

programme.title: Bryce Canyon Relaxation
programme.desc: Admiring the wonders of one of the world's most breathtaking natural destinations: Bryce Canyon, in Utah.
